stories.Title: Reddit announces: "Our data is not free"
stories.Description: With its new developer API terms, the company seeks to capitalize on its role as a key resource for data used to train AI chatbots.
stories.Tweet: Reddit announces: "Our data is not free" 📦 With its new developer API terms, the company seeks to capitalize on its role as a key resource for data used to train AI chatbots. #reddit https://www.theverge.com/2023/4/18/23688463/reddit-developer-api-terms-change-monetization-ai

stories.Title: Tim Cook is optimistic about AI
stories.Description: During a recent interview following the opening of the new Apple store in Mumbai, the CEO said that AI is the root of many of their products today.

stories.Title: Salesforce announces generative AI-driven workflow tools
stories.Description: The future of tooling is coming, as the company is currently developing a generative AI that allows code to be created based on written requests.

stories.Title: Telescopes on the Moon? Yes, it might be possible
stories.Description: The renaissance in lunar exploration has opened up new possibilities for space missions, including the development of infrared astronomy made possible by the Moon's low gravity.
stories.Tweet: Telescopes on the Moon? Yes, it might be possible 📦 The renaissance in lunar exploration has opened up new possibilities for space missions, including the development of infrared astronomy made possible by the Moon's low gravity. #space https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/04/building-telescopes-on-the-moon-is-becoming-an-achievable-goal/

stories.Title: Sateliot gets "The GroundBreaker" to orbit
stories.Description: In a shared mission with SpaceX's Falcon 9, the Spanish company launched a satellite that aims to provide 5G coverage in remote areas.

stories.Title: Microsoft AI is coming to the healthcare system
stories.Description: Through its partnership with Epic Systems and the implementation of the GPT-4 optimization, the company plans to reduce a significant amount of pressure faced by medical professionals.

stories.Title: Meta’s layoffs continue
stories.Description: The company just announced its latest round of job cuts, impacting employees with backgrounds in user experience, software engineering, graphics programming, and other roles.

stories.Title: Volkswagen's big move in China
stories.Description: In an effort to better meet China's consumer needs, the German auto giant revealed that it will invest one billion euros in a new center for the development of electric cars.

stories.Title: Tesla cuts prices in the U.S.
stories.Description: This is the sixth time this year the company has lowered prices on its Model Y and Model 3 electric vehicles. Is this a move to drive sales or a sign of concerns about profit margins?
stories.Tweet: Tesla cuts prices in the U.S. 📦 This is the sixth time this year the company has lowered prices on its Model Y and Model 3 electric vehicles. Is this a move to drive sales or a sign of concerns about profit margins? #tesla https://www.cnbc.com/2023/04/19/tesla-cuts-us-prices-for-sixth-time-this-year-ahead-of-q1-results.html

stories.Title: The new Model 3 is here!

stories.Title: Human neurons could be powering AI
stories.Description: This Australian startup is currently exploring the use of stem cells to create biocomputers, combining synthetic biology and human neurons to develop a very special class of AI.
